chapter.title: API changes in libblockdev 3.0
chapter.para: This is a list of API changes in libblockdev 3.0 with suggested replacements.

simplesect.title: LVM plugin
simplesect.para: bd_lvm_data_lv_name() has been removed, use data_lv from BDLVMLVdata instead.
bd_lvm_metadadata_lv_name() has been removed, use metadata_lv from BDLVMLVdata instead.
BD_LVM_MAX_LV_SIZE constant has been removed, use bd_lvm_get_max_lv_size() instead.

simplesect.title: FS plugin
simplesect.para: bd_fs_clean and bd_fs_wipe have new parameter force that allows controlling whether the signatures will be removed from a mounted device or not. Use TRUE to preserve the original behaviour.
